Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: BANG!! A loud noise of an explosion is heard and within minutes smoke starts to spread around.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Hint: Dialogue System for Unity cutscene sequence
Field.Title: Sequence

Field.Hint: The title of this dialogue.
Field.Title: Title

Field.Hint: The actor who is talking.
Field.Title: Actor

Field.Hint: The actor who is listening.
Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Hint: The text that is displayed to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: "ATTENTION EVERYONE!! This is the the Building Management Team. Looks like a fire broke out in the basement, but please do not panic. Our staff will guide you and please wait till the next announcement, for further instructions".

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.

Field.Hint: The text that is displayed to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Everybody please calm down. The situation is under control. Do not panic and please follow my instructions.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: What should we do?? Should we start evacuating??

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: We will be evacuating anytime now, but lets wait to hear from the facilities management before we take a next step.

Field.Value: Yes, lets start evacuating right away.

Field.Value: What is happening?? What was that sound?

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: There was a fire accident in the basement but please do not worry, everyone will be safe. Just follow my lead.

Field.Value: I want to know what are the different mortgage products you have and which one has fixed interest rate for a period of 3 or more years?

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
